DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect stress reduction glucose , blood pressure , quality life overall health well-being overweight obese woman , either Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) without PCOS ( non-PCOS ) . Stress reduction treatment session include one follow activity : breathing exercise , meditation , stretch exercise health education activity .
DOC.brief_title: Stress Reduction Overweight Obese Women Either With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) Without PCOS ( Non-PCOS )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women , age 18 year old 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) â‰¥ 25 kg/m2 ( overweight obese ) Exclusion criterion : 1 . Current pregnancy 2 . Secondary cause hyperandrogenemia , know suspect androgen secreting tumor , Cushing 's syndrome , hyperprolactinemia ( prolactin > 30 ) 3 . Untreated hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism ( define TSH < 0.2 > 5.5 mIU/mL ) 4 . Severe active neuropsychological disorder psychosis suicidal ideation 5 . Severe untreated depression anxiety . Women severe depression anxiety allow participate care mental health specialist long permission mental health specialist continue followup mental health specialist study . 6 . History inpatient admission psychiatric disorder within past two year 7 . Active alcohol drug abuse 8 . Inability read , speak write English 9 . Inability commit intervention followup 10 . Current enrollment stress reduction program 11 . Mindfulness practice within past 6 month ( regular formal practice least week ) 12 . Current enrollment investigative study 13 . Type 1 diabetes
